title: Font ID...please.
content:
Can anyone point me to the ID of the font that reads "yiddishlands" to the right? I've looked around and the closest thing i can find is Knockout No. 46 Flyweight, but the crossbar on the "A" is too low. Anyone have any ideas? Thanks for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018181754im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1096_3848.jpg)
author: standardlipsum
